attributes.title: Worse app
attributes.review: Absolutely bad. It took 5 hours to download and drained my battery. Then I tried to put my phone to charge and it wouldn’t. Eventually my phone died and couldn’t use it for about 3 hours. 3 hours to charge a phone!! I think this app is up to something.

attributes.title: ✨🧚🏼‍♂️terrible app🧚🏼‍♂️✨
attributes.review: Worst app my phone has ever had, had to throw the whole thing away. For some reason after I do unloaded this piece of trash app my phone would not go on dark mode and everything was in Russian? Let me know if anyone else is having g this problem or if it is just me.

attributes.title: Awful. Really just terrible.
attributes.review: I’m very confused by the app interface. It took forever to download. When it did download it kept crashing. The way it’s setup is very difficult to navigate and worst of all, I keep seeing this strange man child all over the app? Where’s the president??

attributes.title: HORRIBLE APP👎🏽👎🏽
attributes.review: i downloaded this app because i wanted to support the amazing cheese puff president😘 BUT the app took SO long to download and once it downloaded MY PHONE STARTED OVERHEATING. THIS APP IS TRAsh. ANd the photo was SO DISTURBING i was about to THROW UP🤮. i hope this app gets removed because it is one of the worst apps ever to exist. the cheese puff should create a better app. but anyways MAKE AMERICA GREAT AGAIN 🤡🤡🙈🙈

attributes.title: Soo horrible
attributes.review: I can’t believe this unbelievable, disgusting, horrible app was able to get into my phone let alone into the App Store. It completely wastes your time and there is no use of it. I don’t recommend downloading this app. It’s literally an app that your going to  regret getting.

attributes.title: App made me delusional
attributes.review: I’m 20, was waiting tables at the restaurant I work at. I was serving a party of 3, a mom, dad and daughter of like 5 or 6. Daughter clearly has Down syndrome. She ordered a turkey sandwich without tomatoes. I think to myself “No tomato for the potato”. Didn’t realize I said it out loud until her asked me to repeat what I had said. I blame trump.

attributes.title: the worst.
attributes.review: Absolutely awful app-I wanted to see what bunker boy had to say but then i had to see his face on here! I mean it was just so taxing having to look at his cheeto skin. And then the propaganda! absolutely wild. would never recommend this app! not even to my racist grandma! if i could give negative stars I would.

attributes.title: This app is horrible
attributes.review: I downloaded this app to give trump a chance but he is a horrible man and doesn’t deserve any votes this man is one person who I won’t feel sorry for if they die never get this app never support trump he is a misogynistic her who sexually assaults woman he needs to go to jail not to be our president

attributes.title: Terrible app...
attributes.review: This app is AWFUL!! You’d think the leader of our country would have designed a more user friendly app to keep up with his right winged agenda but NO. This is app is a disgrace to the already disgraceful Republican Party. Feeling the second hand embarrassment but hey you can’t expect too much from the guy!! 🤮🙈

attributes.title: so disappointing!
attributes.review: first, I’d like to say that I had high hopes for this app but it just doesn’t do what it says!  all it does in fill my phone with nonsense and then crash!! then my whole phone shuts down!!! I only opened the app ONCE!!!!!  don’t even bother fixing this app it isn’t even worth it!!!!!!
